title: Carpet fragments
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: triple cloth with areas of compound weave
description: Carpet fragments similar in style to Kidderminster or Ingrain carpeting. Component A is a border section with a symmetrical floral repeat within various guard borders. In coral, green, pale blue on a dark blue ground. Component B is a section of the field with medium-scale allover symmetrical flower and leaf pattern.
name: Carpet fragments
